text: Sydney Siege: Up To 40 Hostages Held - Reports #sidneysiege @skynews http://t.co/6NcYLpqsIN
conclusion: 40-50 hostages are being held at cafe in Sydney (according to Lindt CEO)

text: UPDATE: Parts of #Sydney locked down amid cafe hostage crisis; Sydney Opera House evacuated http://t.co/UvMu4d0f9q http://t.co/wmWyzhBHnw
conclusion: The Sydney Opera House has been evacuated
